ygData.subject: Re: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: The only thing Clerics can do in EQ is 1. Boast AC/HP 2. Heal 3. Meditate 4. Heal some more 5. Meditate 6. Heal even more 7. Meditate 8. Buff spells ran out so
ygData.messageBody:
The only thing Clerics can do in EQ is

1. Boast AC/HP
2. Heal
3. Meditate
4. Heal some more
5. Meditate
6. Heal even more
7. Meditate
8. Buff spells ran out so recast
9. Mediate

That's why no one wants to play them on the list...... Going to start
one tonight just in case we need it.

Wilson wrote:

> Well, Sereph said something about Clerics. There are somethings
> special about Clerics....a)They tankb)They stand back and heal Its
> useless to have a Troll Cleric <<RPG sake>> but he tanks. Rather have
> a Gnome/Human Cleric that stands back and heal. I've had many bad
> experiences like you guys where your Dear Cleric is trying to tank
> those Dervs/Crocos. That is complete crap. But of course, you have got
> to let him take a few go at the monsters if not SI BEI SIAN! My 2
> cents...
